name: Environment and Obstacles
nameNice: Creating the Environment and the Obstacles
descriptionShort: This section looks at creating the game environment
description: This section looks at creating the environment for the game, making the player interact with it and programmatically creating the obstacles the player must pass through.

lessons.name: part1-1
lessons.description: Outlining how we will go about working through this section.

lessons.name: part1-2
lessons.description: Drawing the ground, using variables to determine its dimensions.

lessons.name: part2-1
lessons.description: Briefly discusses the strategy to how you will generate obstacles

lessons.name: part2-2
lessons.description: Here you'll create your obstacle generating function and create some variables in it to use when making the obstacles

lessons.name: part2-3
lessons.description: In this section you'll finish off your obstacle generation function by generating a pair of entities using the variables created earlier

lessons.name: part2-4
lessons.description: Using a counter to create obstacles at a fixed rate

lessons.name: part2-5
lessons.description: Here you will add code to the game loop to move obstacles across the screen and destroy them if they go off the screen
